mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACH_FILE(F_SEQ,B_SEQ,ORIGIN_FNAME,STORED_FNAME,FILE_SIZE, F_REGDATE, F_DELFLAG ,OWNER) VALUES(A_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'b'||#{b_seq},#{origin_fname},#{stored_fname},#{file_size}, sysdate, 'N',${owner} )
mapper.select: SELECT OWNER, F_SEQ,ORIGIN_FNAME,ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM ATTACH_FILE WHERE B_SEQ = 'b'||#{b_seq} AND F_DELFLAG = 'N'
